# External Documentation Index

## Design Systems
- **tailwind-design-principles.md**: Utility-first CSS methodology, color systems, typography scales
- **spacing-grid-systems.md**: 8pt spatial systems, grid principles, layout scaling strategies

## Responsive Design  
- **mdn-responsive-principles.md**: Mobile-first approach, flexible layouts, responsive typography

## Summary
External documentation gathered to support Logical Front's enterprise visual redesign, focusing on professional design system principles, sophisticated color usage, responsive design patterns, and creating trust-building visual hierarchy for mid-market business clients.
